title: Into My Heart
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c

v1: Come into my heart, blessed Jesus,
Come into my heart, I pray;
My soul is so troubled and weary,
v2: Come into my heart, blessed Jesus,
I need Thee thro' life's dreary way;
The burden of sin is so heavy,
Come into my heart to stay.
v3: Come into my heart, blessed Jesus,
And take all my guilt away;
Then spotless I'll stand in Thy presence,
v4: Come into my heart, blessed Jesus,
Now cleanse and illumine my soul;
Fill me with Thy wonderful Spirit,
Come in and take full control.
c1: Into my heart, into my heart,
Come into my heart, Lord Jesus;
Come in today, come in to stay,
Come into my heart, Lord Jesus.
